translations.literal: Army has grain food arms and armor, leave people use them;
translations.idiomatic: The army will have grain, food, arms, and armor, but they will be left for others to use.

translations.literal: Soldiers although many, general will be person's captive.
translations.idiomatic: Although the soldiers are many, the general will be taken captive.

translations.literal: Its emerges west loses movement, foreign state defeated;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges in the west and loses its proper movement, foreign states will be defeated.

translations.literal: Its emerges east loses movement, central state defeated.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges in the east and loses its proper movement, the central state will be defeated.

sentences.zh: 其色大圜黃滜，可為好事；

translations.literal: Its color large circular yellow bright, can be good affairs;
translations.idiomatic: When its color is large, circular, yellow, and bright, it can portend good affairs.

translations.literal: Its circular large red, arms strong not battle.
translations.idiomatic: When it is circular, large, and red, the arms will be strong but there will be no battle.

translations.literal: Great White white, compare to wolf;
translations.idiomatic: When the Great White is white, compare it to the Wolf.

translations.literal: Red, compare to Heart;
translations.idiomatic: When red, compare it to the Heart.

translations.literal: Yellow, compare to Three Stars left shoulder;
translations.idiomatic: When yellow, compare it to the left shoulder of the Three Stars.

translations.literal: Azure, compare to Three Stars right shoulder;
translations.idiomatic: When azure, compare it to the right shoulder of the Three Stars.

translations.literal: Black, compare to Kui large star.
translations.idiomatic: When black, compare it to the large star of Kui.

sentences.zh: 五星皆從太白而聚乎一舍，其下之國可以兵從天下。

translations.literal: Five stars all follow Great White and gather at one lodging, its below state can use arms follow under heaven.
translations.idiomatic: When all five stars follow the Great White and gather at one lodging, the state below it can use arms to follow all under heaven.

translations.literal: Dwells in solid, has gain;
translations.idiomatic: When it dwells in a solid position, there will be gain.

translations.literal: Dwells in empty, no gain.
translations.idiomatic: When it dwells in an empty position, there will be no gain.

sentences.zh: 行勝色，色勝位，有位勝無位，有色勝無色，行得盡勝之。

translations.literal: Movement overcomes color, color overcomes position, has position overcomes no position, has color overcomes no color, movement obtains completely overcomes it.
translations.idiomatic: Movement overcomes color, color overcomes position, having a position overcomes having no position, having color overcomes having no color, and when movement is complete, it overcomes all.

sentences.zh: 出而留桑榆閒，疾其下國。

translations.literal: Emerges and remains mulberry and elm between, fast its below state.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges and remains between the mulberry and elm, it will be fast for the state below it.

sentences.zh: 上而疾，未盡其日，過參天，疾其對國。

translations.literal: Up and fast, not exhausted its day, passes through third of heaven, fast its opposite state.
translations.idiomatic: When it goes up and is fast, and before its day is exhausted it passes through a third of heaven, it will be fast for the state opposite it.

translations.literal: Up again down, down again up, has rebel general.
translations.idiomatic: When it goes up and then down again, or down and then up again, there will be a rebel general.

translations.literal: Its enters moon, general executed.
translations.idiomatic: When it enters the moon, the general will be executed.

sentences.zh: 金、木星合，光，其下戰不合，兵雖起而不鬬；

translations.literal: Metal, wood star conjoin, bright, its below battle not conjoin, arms although arise and not fight;
translations.idiomatic: When metal and the wood star conjoin and are bright, the battle below them will not conjoin, and although arms will arise, they will not fight.

translations.literal: Conjoin appearance destroyed, wilds have broken army.
translations.idiomatic: When the conjoined appearance is destroyed, the wilds will have a broken army.

sentences.zh: 出西方，昏而出陰，陰兵彊；

translations.literal: Emerges western direction, dusk and emerges yin, yin arms strong;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges in the west and emerges at dusk in the yin, the yin arms will be strong.

translations.literal: Evening meal emerges, small weak;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges at evening meal time, it will be slightly weak.

translations.literal: Midnight emerges, medium weak;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges at midnight, it will be moderately weak.

sentences.zh: 雞鳴出，大弱：是謂陰陷於陽。

translations.literal: Rooster crows emerges, greatly weak: this is called yin trapped in yang.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges at rooster crow time, it will be greatly weak: this is called yin trapped in yang.

sentences.zh: 其在東方，乘明而出陽，陽兵之彊，雞鳴出，小弱；

translations.literal: Its in eastern direction, ride brightness and emerges yang, yang arms' strength, rooster crows emerges, small weak;
translations.idiomatic: When it is in the east and emerges in the yang riding on brightness, the yang arms will be strong. When it emerges at rooster crow time, it will be slightly weak.

translations.literal: Midnight emerges, medium weak;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges at midnight, it will be moderately weak.

sentences.zh: 昏出，大弱：是謂陽陷於陰。

translations.literal: Dusk emerges, greatly weak: this is called yang trapped in yin.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges at dusk, it will be greatly weak: this is called yang trapped in yin.

sentences.zh: 太白伏也，以出兵，兵有殃。

translations.literal: Great White hidden, using send out arms, arms have calamity.
translations.idiomatic: When the Great White is hidden, if one sends out arms, the arms will have calamity.

translations.literal: Its emerges mao south, south overcomes northern direction;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges south of mao, the south will overcome the north.

translations.literal: Emerges mao north, north overcomes southern direction;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges north of mao, the north will overcome the south.

translations.literal: Exactly at mao, eastern state benefits.
translations.idiomatic: When it is exactly at mao, the eastern state will benefit.

translations.literal: Emerges you north, north overcomes southern direction;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges north of you, the north will overcome the south.

translations.literal: Emerges you south, south overcomes northern direction;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges south of you, the south will overcome the north.

translations.literal: Exactly at you, western state overcomes.
translations.idiomatic: When it is exactly at you, the western state will overcome.

translations.literal: Its with arrayed stars mutually violate, small battle;
translations.idiomatic: When it mutually violates with the arrayed stars, there will be a small battle.

translations.literal: Five stars, great battle.
translations.idiomatic: When it is with the five stars, there will be a great battle.

sentences.zh: 其相犯，太白出其南，南國敗；

translations.literal: Its mutually violate, Great White emerges its south, southern state defeated;
translations.idiomatic: When they mutually violate, if the Great White emerges to its south, the southern state will be defeated.

translations.literal: Emerges its north, northern state defeated.
translations.idiomatic: If it emerges to its north, the northern state will be defeated.

translations.literal: Movement fast, military;
translations.idiomatic: When its movement is fast, it portends military affairs.

translations.literal: Not move, civil.
translations.idiomatic: When it does not move, it portends civil affairs.

sentences.zh: 色白五芒，出蚤為月蝕，晚為天夭及彗星，將發其國。

translations.literal: Color white five rays, emerges early is moon eclipse, late is heavenly calamity and comet, general sends forth its state.
translations.idiomatic: When its color is white with five rays, if it emerges early it portends a lunar eclipse, and if late it portends heavenly calamity and comets, and the general will send forth his state.

sentences.zh: 出東為德，舉事左之迎之，吉。

translations.literal: Emerges east is virtue, raise affairs left it welcome it, auspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges in the east, it is virtue. If one raises affairs to the left and welcomes it, it will be auspicious.

sentences.zh: 出西為刑，舉事右之背之，吉。

translations.literal: Emerges west is punishment, raise affairs right it turn back on it, auspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges in the west, it is punishment. If one raises affairs to the right and turns one's back on it, it will be auspicious.

translations.literal: Opposite this all inauspicious.
translations.idiomatic: Opposite to this, all will be inauspicious.

translations.literal: Great White light visible shadow, battle overcomes.
translations.idiomatic: When the Great White's light casts a visible shadow, the battle will be won.

sentences.zh: 晝見而經天，是謂爭明，彊國弱，小國彊，女主昌。

translations.literal: Daytime visible and passes through heaven, this is called contend brightness, strong state weak, small state strong, female ruler prospers.
translations.idiomatic: When it is visible in the daytime and passes through heaven, this is called contending for brightness. Strong states will become weak, small states will become strong, and the female ruler will prosper.

translations.literal: Kang is sparse temple, Great White temple also.
translations.idiomatic: Kang is the sparse temple, and it is also the temple of the Great White.

translations.literal: Great White, great minister also, its title superior duke.
translations.idiomatic: The Great White is a great minister, and its title is superior duke.

sentences.zh: 其他名殷星、太正、營星、觀星、宮星、明星、大衰、大澤、終星、大相、天浩、序星、月緯。

translations.literal: Its other names Yin Star, Great Correct, Encampment Star, Observation Star, Palace Star, Bright Star, Great Decline, Great Marsh, End Star, Great Minister, Heavenly Vast, Sequence Star, Moon Latitude.
translations.idiomatic: Its other names are the Yin Star, the Great Correct, the Encampment Star, the Observation Star, the Palace Star, the Bright Star, the Great Decline, the Great Marsh, the End Star, the Great Minister, the Heavenly Vast, the Sequence Star, and the Moon Latitude.

translations.literal: Great Minister of War position carefully wait for this.
translations.idiomatic: The position of Great Minister of War carefully waits for this.

sentences.zh: 察日辰之會，以治辰星之位。

translations.literal: Observe sun and chen's meeting, to govern Chen Star's position.
translations.idiomatic: Observe the meeting of the sun and chen to determine the position of the Chen Star.

sentences.zh: 曰北方水，太陰之精，主冬，日壬、癸。

translations.literal: Called northern direction water, Great Yin's essence, governs winter, days ren, gui.
translations.idiomatic: It is called the northern water, the essence of the Great Yin, governs winter, and corresponds to the days ren and gui.

sentences.zh: 刑失者，罰出辰星，以其宿命國。

translations.literal: Punishment loses, punishment emerges Chen Star, using its lodging commands state.
translations.idiomatic: When punishment is lost, punishment emerges from the Chen Star, and it uses its lodging to command the state.

sentences.zh: 是正四時：仲春春分，夕出郊奎、婁、胃東五舍，為齊；

translations.literal: This corrects four seasons: mid-spring spring equinox, evening emerges suburb Kui, Lou, Wei east five lodgings, is Qi;
translations.idiomatic: This corrects the four seasons: at mid-spring and the spring equinox, it emerges in the evening in the suburbs east of Kui, Lou, and Wei for five lodgings, and this is Qi.

sentences.zh: 仲夏夏至，夕出郊東井、輿鬼、柳東七舍，為楚；

translations.literal: Mid-summer summer solstice, evening emerges suburb Eastern Well, Chariot Ghost, Willow east seven lodgings, is Chu;
translations.idiomatic: At mid-summer and the summer solstice, it emerges in the evening in the suburbs east of the Eastern Well, Chariot Ghost, and Willow for seven lodgings, and this is Chu.

sentences.zh: 仲秋秋分，夕出郊角、亢、氐、房東四舍，為漢；

translations.literal: Mid-autumn autumn equinox, evening emerges suburb Horn, Kang, Di, Fang east four lodgings, is Han;
translations.idiomatic: At mid-autumn and the autumn equinox, it emerges in the evening in the suburbs east of Horn, Kang, Di, and Fang for four lodgings, and this is Han.

sentences.zh: 仲冬冬至，晨出郊東方，與尾、箕、斗、牽牛俱西，為中國。

translations.literal: Mid-winter winter solstice, dawn emerges suburb eastern direction, with Tail, Winnowing Basket, Dipper, Leading Ox together west, is central state.
translations.idiomatic: At mid-winter and the winter solstice, it emerges at dawn in the suburbs in the east, and together with Tail, Winnowing Basket, Dipper, and Leading Ox it goes west, and this is the central state.

translations.literal: Its emerging and entering constantly uses chen, xu, chou, wei.
translations.idiomatic: Its emerging and entering constantly uses chen, xu, chou, and wei.

translations.literal: Its early, is moon eclipse;
translations.idiomatic: When it is early, it portends a lunar eclipse.

translations.literal: Late, is comet and heavenly calamity.
translations.idiomatic: When it is late, it portends comets and heavenly calamity.

sentences.zh: 其時宜效不效為失，追兵在外不戰。

translations.literal: Its time should respond not respond is loss, pursuing arms outside not battle.
translations.idiomatic: When its time should respond but does not respond, this is a loss, and pursuing arms outside will not battle.

translations.literal: One time not emerge, its time not harmonious;
translations.idiomatic: If it does not emerge at one time, that time will not be harmonious.

translations.literal: Four seasons not emerge, under heaven great famine.
translations.idiomatic: If it does not emerge in the four seasons, all under heaven will have a great famine.

sentences.zh: 其當效而出也，色白為旱，黃為五穀熟，赤為兵，黑為水。

translations.literal: Its should respond and emerges, color white is drought, yellow is five grains ripe, red is arms, black is water.
translations.idiomatic: When it should respond and emerges, a white color portends drought, yellow portends the ripening of the five grains, red portends arms, and black portends water.

sentences.zh: 出東方，大而白，有兵於外，解。

translations.literal: Emerges eastern direction, large and white, has arms at outside, resolve.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges in the east, large and white, if there are arms outside, they will be resolved.

translations.literal: Constantly in eastern direction, its red, central state overcomes;
translations.idiomatic: When it is constantly in the east and is red, the central state will overcome.

translations.literal: Its west and red, foreign state benefits.
translations.idiomatic: When it is in the west and is red, foreign states will benefit.

translations.literal: No arms at outside and red, arms arise.
translations.idiomatic: When there are no arms outside and it is red, arms will arise.

sentences.zh: 其與太白俱出東方，皆赤而角，外國大敗，中國勝；

translations.literal: Its with Great White together emerge eastern direction, all red and horn, foreign state greatly defeated, central state overcomes;
translations.idiomatic: When it and the Great White emerge together in the east, both red and with horns, foreign states will be greatly defeated and the central state will overcome.

sentences.zh: 其與太白俱出西方，皆赤而角，外國利。

translations.literal: Its with Great White together emerge western direction, all red and horn, foreign state benefits.
translations.idiomatic: When it and the Great White emerge together in the west, both red and with horns, foreign states will benefit.

sentences.zh: 五星分天之中，積于東方，中國利；

translations.literal: Five stars divide heaven's center, accumulate at eastern direction, central state benefits;
translations.idiomatic: When the five stars divide the center of heaven and accumulate in the east, the central state will benefit.

sentences.zh: 積于西方，外國用［兵］者利。

translations.literal: Accumulate at western direction, foreign state uses [arms] benefits.
translations.idiomatic: When they accumulate in the west, foreign states that use arms will benefit.

sentences.zh: 五星皆從辰星而聚于一舍，其所捨之國可以法致天下。

translations.literal: Five stars all follow Chen Star and gather at one lodging, its lodging state can use method reach under heaven.
translations.idiomatic: When all five stars follow the Chen Star and gather at one lodging, the state where it lodges can use method to reach all under heaven.

translations.literal: Chen Star not emerge, Great White is guest;
translations.idiomatic: When the Chen Star does not emerge, the Great White is the guest.

translations.literal: Its emerges, Great White is host.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges, the Great White is the host.

sentences.zh: 出而與太白不相從，野雖有軍，不戰。

translations.literal: Emerges and with Great White not mutually follow, wilds although have army, not battle.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges and does not mutually follow with the Great White, although there is an army in the wilds, they will not battle.

translations.literal: Emerges eastern direction, Great White emerges western direction;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges in the east and the Great White emerges in the west.

sentences.zh: 若出西方，太白出東方，為格，野雖有兵不戰。

translations.literal: If emerges western direction, Great White emerges eastern direction, is ge, wilds although have arms not battle.
translations.idiomatic: If it emerges in the west and the Great White emerges in the east, this is ge, and although there are arms in the wilds, they will not battle.

sentences.zh: 失其時而出，為當寒反溫，當溫反寒。

translations.literal: Loses its time and emerges, is should cold reverse warm, should warm reverse cold.
translations.idiomatic: When it loses its proper time and emerges, the weather will be reversed: when it should be cold, it is instead warm, and when it should be warm, it is instead cold.

sentences.zh: 當出不出，是謂擊卒，兵大起。

translations.literal: Should emerge not emerge, this is called strike soldiers, arms greatly arise.
translations.idiomatic: When it should emerge but does not emerge, this is called striking the soldiers, and arms will greatly arise.

sentences.zh: 其入太白中而上出，破軍殺將，客軍勝；

translations.literal: Its enters Great White center and up emerges, breaks army kills general, guest army overcomes;
translations.idiomatic: When it enters the center of the Great White and emerges upward, it will break the army and kill the general, and the guest army will overcome.

translations.literal: Down emerges, guest loses land.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges downward, the guest will lose land.

sentences.zh: 辰星來抵太白，太白不去，將死。

translations.literal: Chen Star comes reaches Great White, Great White not leaves, general dies.
translations.idiomatic: When the Chen Star comes and reaches the Great White, and the Great White does not leave, the general will die.

sentences.zh: 正旗上出，破軍殺將，客勝；

translations.literal: Straight banner up emerges, breaks army kills general, guest overcomes;
translations.idiomatic: When the straight banner emerges upward, it will break the army and kill the general, and the guest will overcome.

translations.literal: Down emerges, guest loses land.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges downward, the guest will lose land.

translations.literal: Look at banner's pointing, using command break army.
translations.idiomatic: Look at where the banner points to command the breaking of the army.

sentences.zh: 其繞環太白，若與鬬，大戰，客勝。

translations.literal: Its circles around Great White, if with battle, great battle, guest overcomes.
translations.idiomatic: When it circles around the Great White, if they battle, there will be a great battle, and the guest will overcome.

sentences.zh: 兔過太白，閒可椷劍，小戰，客勝。

translations.literal: Rabbit passes Great White, space can hold sword, small battle, guest overcomes.
translations.idiomatic: When the Rabbit passes the Great White, and the space between them can hold a sword, there will be a small battle, and the guest will overcome.

translations.literal: Rabbit dwells Great White front, army stops;
translations.idiomatic: When the Rabbit dwells in front of the Great White, the army will stop.

translations.literal: Emerges Great White left, small battle;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges to the left of the Great White, there will be a small battle.

sentences.zh: 摩太白，有數萬人戰，主人吏死；

translations.literal: Rub Great White, has several ten thousand people battle, host person official dies;
translations.idiomatic: When it rubs against the Great White, there will be a battle with tens of thousands of people, and the host's officials will die.

sentences.zh: 出太白右，去三尺，軍急約戰。

translations.literal: Emerges Great White right, leaves three chi, army urgent appoints battle.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges to the right of the Great White and is three chi away, the army will urgently appoint a battle.

translations.literal: Blue horn, arms worry;
translations.idiomatic: A blue horn portends worry about arms.

translations.literal: Black horn, water.
translations.idiomatic: A black horn portends water.

translations.literal: Red movement exhausts arms' place of ending.
translations.idiomatic: Red movement exhausts arms to their end.

sentences.zh: 兔七命，曰小正、辰星、天欃、安周星、細爽、能星、鉤星。

translations.literal: Rabbit seven names, called small correct, Chen Star, heavenly chan, An Zhou Star, fine refreshing, capable star, hook star.
translations.idiomatic: The Rabbit has seven names: Small Correct, Chen Star, Heavenly Chan, An Zhou Star, Fine Refreshing, Capable Star, and Hook Star.

sentences.zh: 其色黃而小，出而易處，天下之文變而不善矣。

translations.literal: Its color yellow and small, emerges and easy place, under heaven's civil changes and not good.
translations.idiomatic: When its color is yellow and small, and it emerges and easily changes place, the civil affairs of all under heaven will change and not be good.

sentences.zh: 兔五色，青圜憂，白圜喪，赤圜中不平，黑圜吉。

translations.literal: Rabbit five colors, blue circle worry, white circle mourning, red circle center not peaceful, black circle auspicious.
translations.idiomatic: The Rabbit has five colors: blue and circular portends worry, white and circular portends mourning, red and circular portends an unpeaceful center, and black and circular portends auspiciousness.

sentences.zh: 赤角犯我城，黃角地之爭，白角號泣之聲。

translations.literal: Red horn violates our city, yellow horn land's contention, white horn crying and weeping sounds.
translations.idiomatic: A red horn violates our city, a yellow horn portends contention over land, and a white horn portends the sound of crying and weeping.

sentences.zh: 其出東方，行四舍四十八日，其數二十日，而反入于東方；

translations.literal: Its emerges eastern direction, moves four lodgings forty-eight days, its count twenty days, and returns enters at eastern direction;
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges in the east, it moves through four lodgings for forty-eight days, and after counting twenty days, it returns and enters in the east.

sentences.zh: 其出西方，行四舍四十八日，其數二十日，而反入于西方。

translations.literal: Its emerges western direction, moves four lodgings forty-eight days, its count twenty days, and returns enters at western direction.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges in the west, it moves through four lodgings for forty-eight days, and after counting twenty days, it returns and enters in the west.

sentences.zh: 其一候之營室、角、畢、箕、柳。

translations.literal: Its one waits for Encampment Chamber, Horn, Net, Winnowing Basket, Willow.
translations.idiomatic: One waits for it at the Encampment Chamber, Horn, Net, Winnowing Basket, and Willow.

translations.literal: Emerges Fang, Heart between, earth moves.
translations.idiomatic: When it emerges between Fang and Heart, the earth will move.

translations.literal: Chen Star's color: spring, blue yellow;
translations.idiomatic: The color of the Chen Star: in spring, blue and yellow.

translations.literal: Summer, red white;
translations.idiomatic: In summer, red and white.

translations.literal: Autumn, blue white, and year ripe;
translations.idiomatic: In autumn, blue and white, and the year will be ripe.

translations.literal: Winter, yellow and not bright.
translations.idiomatic: In winter, yellow and not bright.

translations.literal: Immediately changes its color, its time not prosperous.
translations.idiomatic: If it immediately changes its color, that time will not be prosperous.

translations.literal: Spring not visible, great wind, autumn then not fruit.
translations.idiomatic: If it is not visible in spring, there will be great winds, and in autumn there will be no fruit.

sentences.zh: 夏不見，有六十日之旱，月蝕。

translations.literal: Summer not visible, has sixty days' drought, moon eclipse.
translations.idiomatic: If it is not visible in summer, there will be sixty days of drought and a lunar eclipse.

translations.literal: Autumn not visible, has arms, spring then not grow.
translations.idiomatic: If it is not visible in autumn, there will be arms, and in spring things will not grow.

sentences.zh: 冬不見，陰雨六十日，有流邑，夏則不長。

translations.literal: Winter not visible, yin rain sixty days, has flowing city, summer then not grow.
translations.idiomatic: If it is not visible in winter, there will be yin rain for sixty days and a flowing city, and in summer things will not grow.

translations.literal: Horn, Kang, Di, Yanzhou.
translations.idiomatic: Horn, Kang, and Di correspond to Yanzhou.

translations.literal: Fang, Heart, Yuzhou.
translations.idiomatic: Fang and Heart correspond to Yuzhou.

translations.literal: Tail, Winnowing Basket, Youzhou.
translations.idiomatic: Tail and Winnowing Basket correspond to Youzhou.

translations.literal: Dipper, River, Lake.
translations.idiomatic: The Dipper corresponds to the River and Lake.

translations.literal: Leading Ox, Weaving Maiden, Yangzhou.
translations.idiomatic: Leading Ox and Weaving Maiden correspond to Yangzhou.

translations.literal: Xu, Wei, Qingzhou.
translations.idiomatic: Xu and Wei correspond to Qingzhou.

translations.literal: Encampment Chamber reaches Eastern Wall, Bingzhou.
translations.idiomatic: From Encampment Chamber to Eastern Wall corresponds to Bingzhou.

translations.literal: Kui, Lou, Wei, Xuzhou.
translations.idiomatic: Kui, Lou, and Wei correspond to Xuzhou.

translations.literal: Mao, Net, Jizhou.
translations.idiomatic: Mao and Net correspond to Jizhou.

translations.literal: Turtle Beak, Three Stars, Yizhou.
translations.idiomatic: Turtle Beak and the Three Stars correspond to Yizhou.

translations.literal: Eastern Well, Chariot Ghost, Yongzhou.
translations.idiomatic: Eastern Well and Chariot Ghost correspond to Yongzhou.

translations.literal: Willow, Seven Stars, Extended Net, Three Rivers.
translations.idiomatic: Willow, Seven Stars, and Extended Net correspond to the Three Rivers.

translations.literal: Wings, Chariot Box, Jingzhou.
translations.idiomatic: Wings and Chariot Box correspond to Jingzhou.

sentences.zh: 七星為員官，辰星廟，蠻夷星也。

translations.literal: Seven Stars are round official, Chen Star temple, barbarian star also.
translations.idiomatic: The Seven Stars are the round official, the temple of the Chen Star, and also the barbarian star.

translations.literal: Two armies mutually face, sun halo;
translations.idiomatic: When two armies face each other, there will be a solar halo.

translations.literal: Halo equal, strength equal;
translations.idiomatic: When the halos are equal, the strength is equal.

translations.literal: Thick long large, has victory;
translations.idiomatic: When it is thick, long, and large, there will be victory.

translations.literal: Thin short small, no victory.
translations.idiomatic: When it is thin, short, and small, there will be no victory.

translations.literal: Heavy embrace great break none.
translations.idiomatic: When it is heavy and embracing, there will be great breaking, but if there is none, there will be no breaking.

sentences.zh: 抱為和，背［為］不和，為分離相去。

translations.literal: Embrace is harmony, back [is] not harmony, is separation mutually depart.
translations.idiomatic: Embracing is harmony; turning the back is not harmony, and this is separation and mutual departure.

translations.literal: Straight is self-establish, establish marquises and kings;
translations.idiomatic: When it is straight, it is self-establishment, and marquises and kings will be established.

translations.literal: (Pointing halo) [Broken army] (if says) kill general.
translations.idiomatic: When pointing at the halo, it portends a broken army and killing of the general.

translations.literal: Carry and wear, has joy.
translations.idiomatic: When it carries and wears, there will be joy.

translations.literal: Surround in center, center overcomes;
translations.idiomatic: When it surrounds the center, the center will overcome.

translations.literal: At outside, outside overcomes.
translations.idiomatic: When it is outside, the outside will overcome.

translations.literal: Blue outside red center, using harmony mutually depart;
translations.idiomatic: When it is blue outside and red in the center, they will mutually depart in harmony.

translations.literal: Red outside blue center, using evil mutually depart.
translations.idiomatic: When it is red outside and blue in the center, they will mutually depart in evil.

sentences.zh: 氣暈先至而後去，居軍勝。

translations.literal: Qi halo first arrives and later departs, dwelling army overcomes.
translations.idiomatic: When the qi halo arrives first and departs later, the dwelling army will overcome.

translations.literal: First arrives first departs, front benefit later illness;
translations.idiomatic: When it arrives first and departs first, there will be benefit in the front and illness later.

translations.literal: Later arrives later departs, front illness later benefit;
translations.idiomatic: When it arrives later and departs later, there will be illness in the front and benefit later.

sentences.zh: 後至先去，前後皆病，居軍不勝。

translations.literal: Later arrives first departs, front and back all illness, dwelling army not overcome.
translations.idiomatic: When it arrives later and departs first, there will be illness both in the front and back, and the dwelling army will not overcome.

sentences.zh: 見而去，其發疾，雖勝無功。

translations.literal: Visible and departs, its sending fast, although overcome no merit.
translations.idiomatic: When it is visible and then departs, its sending will be fast, and although there is victory, there will be no merit.

translations.literal: Visible half day and above, merit great.
translations.idiomatic: When it is visible for more than half a day, the merit will be great.

sentences.zh: 白虹屈短，上下兌，有者下大流血。

translations.literal: White rainbow bent short, up and down sharp, has below great flowing blood.
translations.idiomatic: When the white rainbow is bent and short, and sharp above and below, there will be great flowing of blood below.

sentences.zh: 日暈制勝，近期三十日，遠期六十日。

translations.literal: Sun halo controls victory, near period thirty days, far period sixty days.
translations.idiomatic: The solar halo controls victory, with a near period of thirty days and a far period of sixty days.

translations.literal: Its eclipse, eclipse place not beneficial;
translations.idiomatic: When it is eclipsed, the place of the eclipse will not be beneficial.

translations.literal: Again born, born place beneficial;
translations.idiomatic: When it is born again, the place of birth will be beneficial.

translations.literal: And eclipse increasingly exhausted, is host position.
translations.idiomatic: When the eclipse is increasingly exhausted, it is the host position.

sentences.zh: 以其直及日所宿，加以日時，用命其國也。

translations.literal: Using its straight and sun's lodging, adding sun and time, using commands its state.
translations.idiomatic: Using its straight direction and the sun's lodging, and adding the sun and time, one uses this to command the state.

translations.literal: Moon moves central way, peaceful and harmonious.
translations.idiomatic: When the moon moves in the central way, there will be peace and harmony.

translations.literal: Yin between, much water, yin affairs.
translations.idiomatic: When it is in the yin between, there will be much water and yin affairs.

translations.literal: Outside north three chi, yin star.
translations.idiomatic: When it is three chi north of the outside, it is the yin star.

translations.literal: North three chi, Great Yin, great water, arms.
translations.idiomatic: When it is three chi to the north, it is the Great Yin, and there will be great water and arms.

translations.literal: Yang between, arrogant and willful.
translations.idiomatic: When it is in the yang between, there will be arrogance and willfulness.

translations.literal: Yang star, much violent prisons.
translations.idiomatic: When it is the yang star, there will be many violent prisons.

translations.literal: Great Yang, great drought mourning also.
translations.idiomatic: When it is the Great Yang, there will be great drought and mourning.

sentences.zh: 角、天門，十月為四月，十一月為五月，十二月為六月，水發，近三尺，遠五尺。

translations.literal: Horn, Heavenly Gate, tenth month is fourth month, eleventh month is fifth month, twelfth month is sixth month, water arises, near three chi, far five chi.
translations.idiomatic: At Horn and the Heavenly Gate, the tenth month corresponds to the fourth month, the eleventh month to the fifth month, and the twelfth month to the sixth month. Water will arise, three chi near and five chi far.

translations.literal: Violates four assistants, assistant ministers executed.
translations.idiomatic: When it violates the four assistants, the assistant ministers will be executed.

sentences.zh: 行南北河，以陰陽言，旱水兵喪。

translations.literal: Moves north and south rivers, using yin and yang speak, drought water arms mourning.
translations.idiomatic: When it moves at the north and south rivers, speaking in terms of yin and yang, there will be drought, water, arms, and mourning.

sentences.zh: 月蝕歲星，其宿地，饑若亡。

translations.literal: Moon eclipses Year Star, its lodging place, famine like destruction.
translations.idiomatic: When the moon eclipses the Year Star, at its lodging place there will be famine, as if destruction.

sentences.zh: 熒惑也亂，填星也下犯上，太白也彊國以戰敗，辰星也女亂。

translations.literal: Sparkling Deluder also chaos, Filling Star also below violates above, Great White also strong state using battle defeated, Chen Star also female chaos.
translations.idiomatic: The Sparkling Deluder portends chaos, the Filling Star portends the below violating the above, the Great White portends strong states being defeated in battle, and the Chen Star portends female chaos.

translations.literal: (Eat) [Eclipse] Great Horn, host commands detest it;
translations.idiomatic: When it eclipses the Great Horn, those who command the host will detest it.

translations.literal: Heart, then is internal thief chaos also;
translations.idiomatic: When it is at Heart, there will be internal thief chaos.

translations.literal: Arrayed stars, its lodging place worry.
translations.idiomatic: When it is at the arrayed stars, at its lodging place there will be worry.

sentences.zh: 月食始日，五月者六，六月者五，五月復六，六月者一，而五月者五，凡百一十三月而復始。

translations.literal: Moon eclipse beginning day, fifth month six, sixth month five, fifth month again six, sixth month one, and fifth month five, in all one hundred thirteen months and again beginning.
translations.idiomatic: Beginning from the day of a lunar eclipse, there are six in the fifth month, five in the sixth month, again six in the fifth month, one in the sixth month, and five in the fifth month. In all, after one hundred thirteen months it begins again.

translations.literal: Therefore moon eclipse, constant also;
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, lunar eclipses are constant.

translations.literal: Sun eclipse, is not good also.
translations.idiomatic: Solar eclipses are not good.

sentences.zh: 甲、乙，四海之外，日月不占。

translations.literal: Jia, Yi, four seas' outside, sun and moon not prognosticate.
translations.idiomatic: Jia and Yi correspond to beyond the four seas, and the sun and moon do not prognosticate there.

translations.literal: Bing, Ding, River, Huai, Sea and Dai also.
translations.idiomatic: Bing and Ding correspond to the River, Huai, Sea, and Dai.

translations.literal: Wu, Ji, Central Region, River, Ji also.
translations.idiomatic: Wu and Ji correspond to the Central Region, River, and Ji.

translations.literal: Geng, Xin, Mount Hua west.
translations.idiomatic: Geng and Xin correspond to west of Mount Hua.

translations.literal: Ren, Gui, Mount Heng north.
translations.idiomatic: Ren and Gui correspond to north of Mount Heng.

translations.literal: Sun eclipse, state ruler;
translations.idiomatic: A solar eclipse portends the state ruler.

translations.literal: Moon eclipse, general and minister correspond to it.
translations.idiomatic: A lunar eclipse portends the general and minister.

sentences.zh: 昭明星，大而白，無角，乍上乍下。

translations.literal: Bright Star, large and white, no horn, suddenly up suddenly down.
translations.idiomatic: The Bright Star is large and white, has no horn, and moves suddenly up and suddenly down.

translations.literal: Place emerges state, raises arms, many changes.
translations.idiomatic: The state where it emerges will raise arms, and there will be many changes.

sentences.zh: 五殘星，出正東東方之野。

translations.literal: Five Remnant Star, emerges due east eastern direction's wilds.
translations.idiomatic: The Five Remnant Star emerges in the wilds due east.

sentences.zh: 其星狀類辰星，去地可六丈。

translations.literal: Its star appearance similar Chen Star, leaves earth can six zhang.
translations.idiomatic: The appearance of this star is similar to the Chen Star, and it is about six zhang from the earth.

sentences.zh: 大賊星，出正南南方之野。

translations.literal: Great Thief Star, emerges due south southern direction's wilds.
translations.idiomatic: The Great Thief Star emerges in the wilds due south.

sentences.zh: 星去地可六丈，大而赤，數動，有光。

translations.literal: Star leaves earth can six zhang, large and red, frequently moves, has light.
translations.idiomatic: The star is about six zhang from the earth, large and red, moves frequently, and has light.

sentences.zh: 司危星，出正西西方之野。

translations.literal: Siwei Star, emerges due west western direction's wilds.
translations.idiomatic: The Siwei Star emerges in the wilds due west.

sentences.zh: 星去地可六丈，大而白，類太白。

translations.literal: Star leaves earth can six zhang, large and white, resembles Venus.
translations.idiomatic: The star is about six zhang from the earth, large and white, resembling Venus.

sentences.zh: 獄漢星，出正北北方之野。

translations.literal: Yuhan Star, emerges due north northern direction's wilds.
translations.idiomatic: The Yuhan Star emerges in the wilds due north.

sentences.zh: 星去地可六丈，大而赤，數動，察之中青。

translations.literal: Star leaves earth can six zhang, large and red, frequently moves, observe it center blue-green.
translations.idiomatic: The star is about six zhang from the earth, large and red, moves frequently, and when observed closely appears blue-green in the center.

sentences.zh: 此四野星所出，出非其方，其下有兵，沖不利。

translations.literal: These four wild stars that emerge, emerge not their direction, below them there is warfare, confrontation not favorable.
translations.idiomatic: When these four wild stars appear in directions other than the proper ones, there will be warfare below, and any confrontation will be unfavorable.

sentences.zh: 四填星，所出四隅，去地可四丈。

translations.literal: Four Filling Stars, that emerge four corners, leave earth can four zhang.
translations.idiomatic: The Four Filling Stars appear in the four corners, about four zhang from the earth.

sentences.zh: 地維咸光，亦出四隅，去地可三丈，若月始出。

translations.literal: Diwei Xian Guang, also emerges four corners, leaves earth can three zhang, like moon first emerges.
translations.idiomatic: Diwei Xian Guang also appears in the four corners, about three zhang from the earth, like the moon when it first appears.

translations.literal: That which is seen, below there is disorder;
translations.idiomatic: When seen, there will be disorder below;

translations.literal: Those who cause disorder perish, those with virtue prosper.
translations.idiomatic: Those who cause disorder will perish, while those with virtue will prosper.

sentences.zh: 燭星，狀如太白，其出也不行。

translations.literal: Candle Star, shape like Venus, its emergence also does not move.
translations.idiomatic: The Candle Star, shaped like Venus, does not move when it appears.

translations.literal: When seen then extinguishes.
translations.idiomatic: When seen, it then disappears.

translations.literal: That which it illuminates, cities and towns disorder.
translations.idiomatic: Where it illuminates, cities and towns will be in disorder.

sentences.zh: 如星非星，如雲非雲，命曰歸邪。

translations.literal: Like star not star, like cloud not cloud, named Guixie.
translations.idiomatic: Like a star but not a star, like a cloud but not a cloud, it is called Guixie.

translations.literal: Guixie emerges, necessarily there will be one who returns to state.
translations.idiomatic: When Guixie appears, there will surely be someone returning to the state.

sentences.zh: 星者，金之散氣，［其］本曰火。

translations.literal: Stars, metal's scattered qi, their origin called fire.
translations.idiomatic: Stars are the scattered qi of metal, and their origin is called fire.

translations.literal: Stars numerous, state auspicious;
translations.idiomatic: When stars are numerous, the state will be auspicious;

translations.literal: Few then inauspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When they are few, it will be inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 漢者，亦金之散氣，其本曰水。

translations.literal: The Milky Way, also metal's scattered qi, its origin called water.
translations.idiomatic: The Milky Way is also the scattered qi of metal, and its origin is called water.

sentences.zh: 漢，星多，多水，少則旱，其大經也。

translations.literal: Milky Way, stars many, much water, few then drought, this is the great principle.
translations.idiomatic: When the Milky Way has many stars, there will be much water; when it has few, there will be drought. This is the great principle.

sentences.zh: 天鼓，有音如雷非雷，音在地而下及地。

translations.literal: Heavenly Drum, has sound like thunder not thunder, sound in sky and below reaches earth.
translations.idiomatic: The Heavenly Drum has a sound like thunder but is not thunder; the sound is in the sky and reaches down to the earth.

translations.literal: That which it goes toward, warfare arises below it.
translations.idiomatic: Where it goes, warfare will arise below it.

sentences.zh: 天狗，狀如大奔星，有聲，其下止地，類狗。

translations.literal: Heavenly Dog, shape like great running star, has sound, below it stops on earth, resembles dog.
translations.idiomatic: The Heavenly Dog is shaped like a great shooting star, has a sound, and when it stops on the earth below, it resembles a dog.

sentences.zh: 所墮及，望之如火光炎炎沖天。

translations.literal: Where it falls and reaches, looking at it like fire light blazing blazing rushing to sky.
translations.idiomatic: Where it falls, when viewed it appears like blazing firelight rushing up to the sky.

sentences.zh: 其下圜如數頃田處，上兌者則有黃色，千里破軍殺將。

translations.literal: Below it circular like several qing of fields place, above sharp then has yellow color, thousand li breaks army kills general.
translations.idiomatic: Below it is circular like an area of several qing of fields; when it is sharp above, it has a yellow color, and within a thousand li armies will be broken and generals killed.

translations.literal: Geze Star, like blazing fire's appearance.
translations.idiomatic: The Geze Star appears like blazing fire.

translations.literal: Yellow white, rises from earth and upward.
translations.idiomatic: It is yellow and white, rising from the earth upward.

translations.literal: Below large, above sharp.
translations.idiomatic: It is large below and sharp above.

translations.literal: When it appears, not planting yet harvesting;
translations.idiomatic: When it appears, there will be harvest without planting;

translations.literal: Not having earth work, necessarily there will be great harm.
translations.idiomatic: If there is no earthwork, there will necessarily be great harm.

sentences.zh: 蚩尤之旗，類彗而後曲，象旗。

translations.literal: Chiyou's banner, resembles comet and then curves, resembles banner.
translations.idiomatic: Chiyou's Banner resembles a comet but curves afterward, looking like a banner.

translations.literal: When seen then the king campaigns against four directions.
translations.idiomatic: When it appears, the king will campaign against the four directions.

sentences.zh: 旬始，出於北斗旁，狀如雄雞。

translations.literal: Xunshi, emerges beside Northern Dipper, shape like rooster.
translations.idiomatic: Xunshi emerges beside the Northern Dipper, shaped like a rooster.

translations.literal: When it is angry, blue-black, resembles crouching turtle.
translations.idiomatic: When it is angry, it is blue-black and resembles a crouching turtle.

sentences.zh: 枉矢，類大流星，蛇行而倉黑，望之如有毛羽然。

translations.literal: Wanshi, resembles great shooting star, moves like snake and is dark black, viewing it like having feathers.
translations.idiomatic: Wanshi resembles a great shooting star, moves like a snake and is dark black, and when viewed appears to have feathers.

translations.literal: Changgeng, like one bolt of cloth attached to sky.
translations.idiomatic: Changgeng appears like a bolt of cloth attached to the sky.

translations.literal: This star appears, warfare arises.
translations.idiomatic: When this star appears, warfare will arise.

translations.literal: Star falls to earth, then it is stone.
translations.idiomatic: When a star falls to the earth, it is a stone.

translations.literal: Between Yellow River and Ji River, sometimes there are falling stars.
translations.idiomatic: Between the Yellow River and the Ji River, falling stars sometimes occur.

translations.literal: Sky clear and then Jingxing appears.
translations.idiomatic: When the sky is clear, Jingxing appears.

translations.literal: Jingxing, is the Virtue Star.
translations.idiomatic: Jingxing is the Virtue Star.

sentences.zh: 其狀無常，常出於有道之國。

translations.literal: Its appearance has no constant form, constantly appears in states that have the Way.
translations.idiomatic: Its appearance has no constant form, and it constantly appears in states that have the Way.

sentences.zh: 凡望雲氣，仰而望之，三四百里；

translations.literal: In general observing cloud qi, looking up and observing it, three four hundred li;
translations.idiomatic: In general, when observing cloud qi by looking up, the range is three to four hundred li;

sentences.zh: 平望，在桑榆上，千餘［里］二千里；

translations.literal: Looking level, above mulberry and elm, more than thousand li two thousand li;
translations.idiomatic: When looking level, above the mulberry and elm, the range is more than a thousand to two thousand li;

sentences.zh: 登高而望之，下屬地者三千里。

translations.literal: Ascending high and observing it, below connecting to earth is three thousand li.
translations.idiomatic: When ascending high and observing it, that which extends below to the earth is three thousand li.

translations.literal: Cloud qi that has beast dwelling above it, wins.
translations.idiomatic: When cloud qi has a beast dwelling above it, it will be victorious.

translations.literal: From Mount Hua southward, qi below black above red.
translations.idiomatic: South of Mount Hua, the qi is black below and red above.

translations.literal: Songgao and Three Rivers' suburbs, qi directly red.
translations.idiomatic: In the suburbs of Songgao and the Three Rivers, the qi is directly red.

translations.literal: North of Mount Heng, qi below black below blue-green.
translations.idiomatic: North of Mount Heng, the qi is black and blue-green below.

translations.literal: Between Bohai, Jieshi, Sea, and Mount Tai, qi all black.
translations.idiomatic: Between Bohai, Jieshi, the Sea, and Mount Tai, the qi is all black.

translations.literal: Between Yangtze and Huai Rivers, qi all white.
translations.idiomatic: Between the Yangtze and Huai Rivers, the qi is all white.

translations.literal: Infantry qi white.
translations.idiomatic: Infantry qi is white.

translations.literal: Earthwork qi yellow.
translations.idiomatic: Earthwork qi is yellow.

sentences.zh: 車氣乍高乍下，往往而聚。

translations.literal: Chariot qi suddenly high suddenly low, frequently gathers.
translations.idiomatic: Chariot qi rises and falls suddenly and frequently gathers together.

translations.literal: Cavalry qi low and spreads.
translations.idiomatic: Cavalry qi is low and spreads out.

translations.literal: Soldier qi rounded.
translations.idiomatic: Soldier qi is rounded.

translations.literal: Front low and rear high, fast;
translations.idiomatic: When it is low in front and high in the rear, it is fast;

translations.literal: Front square and rear high, sharp;
translations.idiomatic: When it is square in front and high in the rear, it is sharp;

translations.literal: Rear sharp and low, retreats.
translations.idiomatic: When it is sharp in the rear and low, it retreats.

translations.literal: Qi that is level, its movement is slow.
translations.idiomatic: When the qi is level, its movement is slow.

sentences.zh: 前高而後卑者，不止而反。

translations.literal: Front high and rear low, does not stop and returns.
translations.idiomatic: When it is high in front and low in the rear, it does not stop but returns.

sentences.zh: 氣相遇者，卑勝高，兌勝方。

translations.literal: Qi that meets, low defeats high, sharp defeats square.
translations.idiomatic: When qi meets, the low defeats the high, and the sharp defeats the square.

sentences.zh: 氣來卑而循車通者，不過三四日，去之五六里見。

translations.literal: Qi that comes low and follows chariot path, not more than three four days, going five six li visible.
translations.idiomatic: When qi comes low and follows a chariot path, it will be visible within three or four days, at a distance of five or six li.

sentences.zh: 氣來高七八尺者，不過五六日，去之十餘里見。

translations.literal: Qi that comes high seven eight chi, not more than five six days, going more than ten li visible.
translations.idiomatic: When qi comes high at seven or eight chi, it will be visible within five or six days, at a distance of more than ten li.

sentences.zh: 氣來高丈餘二丈者，不過三四十日，去之五六十里見。

translations.literal: Qi that comes high more than one zhang two zhang, not more than thirty forty days, going fifty sixty li visible.
translations.idiomatic: When qi comes high at more than one to two zhang, it will be visible within thirty to forty days, at a distance of fifty to sixty li.

sentences.zh: 稍云精白者，其將悍，其士怯。

translations.literal: Shao cloud pure white, its general fierce, its soldiers timid.
translations.idiomatic: When the shao cloud is pure white, the general will be fierce but the soldiers will be timid.

sentences.zh: 其大根而前絕遠者，當戰。

translations.literal: That which has large root and front extremely far, should battle.
translations.idiomatic: When it has a large root and extends extremely far in front, there will be battle.

translations.literal: Blue-white, its front low, battle victory;
translations.idiomatic: When it is blue-white and low in front, there will be victory in battle;

translations.literal: Its front red and raised, battle not victorious.
translations.idiomatic: When its front is red and raised, there will be no victory in battle.

translations.literal: Battle array cloud like standing wall.
translations.idiomatic: Battle array clouds are like a standing wall.

translations.literal: Shuttle cloud resembles shuttle.
translations.idiomatic: Shuttle clouds resemble a shuttle.

translations.literal: Axle cloud rounded two ends sharp.
translations.idiomatic: Axle clouds are rounded with both ends sharp.

sentences.zh: 杓雲如繩者，居前亙天，其半半天。

translations.literal: Dipper cloud like rope, located in front spans sky, its half half sky.
translations.idiomatic: Dipper clouds like a rope, located in front, span the sky, with half extending across half the sky.

translations.literal: That which is curved resembles gate tower banner.
translations.idiomatic: That which is curved resembles a gate tower banner.

translations.literal: Hook cloud curved.
translations.idiomatic: Hook clouds are curved.

translations.literal: All these clouds appear, use five colors together to divine.
translations.idiomatic: When all these clouds appear, use the five colors together to divine.

sentences.zh: 而澤摶密，其見動人，乃有占；

translations.literal: And moist rounded dense, its appearance moves people, then there is divination;
translations.idiomatic: When it is moist, rounded, and dense, and its appearance moves people, then there is divination;

translations.literal: Warfare necessarily arises, meets and fights its direct direction.
translations.idiomatic: Warfare will necessarily arise, and they will meet and fight in its direct direction.

translations.literal: What Wang Shuo observes, determines at sun's side.
translations.idiomatic: What Wang Shuo observes is determined by the side of the sun.

translations.literal: Cloud qi beside sun, ruler's image.
translations.idiomatic: Cloud qi beside the sun is an image of the ruler.

translations.literal: All according to its shape to divine.
translations.idiomatic: All are divined according to their shape.

sentences.zh: 故北夷之氣如群畜穹閭，南夷之氣類舟船幡旗。

translations.literal: Therefore northern barbarians' qi like group of animals dome tents, southern barbarians' qi resembles boats ships banners flags.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, the qi of the northern barbarians is like a group of animals and dome tents, while the qi of the southern barbarians resembles boats, ships, banners, and flags.

sentences.zh: 大水處，敗軍場，破國之虛，下有積錢，金寶之上，皆有氣，不可不察。

translations.literal: Great water places, defeated army fields, destroyed states' ruins, below have accumulated coins, gold treasures above, all have qi, cannot not observe.
translations.idiomatic: At the places of great water, the fields of defeated armies, the ruins of destroyed states, and where coins are accumulated below and gold treasures above, there is qi in all these places, and it cannot be left unobserved.

translations.literal: Beside sea mirage qi resembles towers terraces;
translations.idiomatic: Mirage qi beside the sea resembles towers and terraces.

translations.literal: Vast wilds qi becomes palace towers thus.
translations.idiomatic: Qi in the vast wilds becomes like palace towers.

sentences.zh: 雲氣各象其山川人民所聚積。

translations.literal: Cloud qi each resembles its mountains rivers people that which gather accumulate.
translations.idiomatic: Cloud qi each resembles the mountains, rivers, and people that gather and accumulate there.

sentences.zh: 故候息秏者，入國邑，視封疆田疇之正治，城郭室屋門戶之潤澤，次至車服畜產精華。

translations.literal: Therefore those who observe prosperity and decline, enter states and cities, observe borders fields' proper governance, city walls houses doors' moist luster, next reach chariots clothing livestock products essence splendor.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, those who observe prosperity and decline, when entering states and cities, observe the proper governance of borders and fields, the moist luster of city walls, houses, and doors, and next reach the essence and splendor of chariots, clothing, and livestock products.

translations.literal: Substantial prosperity, auspicious;
translations.idiomatic: When there is substantial prosperity, it is auspicious;

translations.literal: Empty decline, inauspicious.
translations.idiomatic: When there is empty decline, it is inauspicious.

sentences.zh: 若煙非煙，若雲非雲，郁郁紛紛，蕭索輪囷，是謂卿雲。

translations.literal: Like smoke not smoke, like cloud not cloud, luxuriant and profuse, desolate and rounded, this is called minister cloud.
translations.idiomatic: Like smoke but not smoke, like cloud but not cloud, luxuriant and profuse, desolate and rounded, this is called the minister cloud.

translations.literal: Minister cloud appears, joyful qi also.
translations.idiomatic: When the minister cloud appears, it is joyful qi.

sentences.zh: 若霧非霧，衣冠而不濡，見則其域被甲而趨。

translations.literal: Like fog not fog, clothing and cap yet not wet, when seen then that region wears armor and rushes.
translations.idiomatic: Like fog but not fog, where the clothing and caps are not wet, when seen, that region will wear armor and rush forward.

sentences.zh: （天）［夫］雷電、蝦虹、辟歷、夜明者，陽氣之動者也，春夏則發，秋冬則藏，故候者無不司之。

translations.literal: Thunder and lightning, rainbow, thunderclap, night brightness, are yang qi's movement, spring summer then emerge, autumn winter then hide, therefore observers all oversee them.
translations.idiomatic: Thunder and lightning, rainbows, thunderclaps, and night brightness are the movement of yang qi. They emerge in spring and summer and hide in autumn and winter. Therefore, observers all oversee them.

translations.literal: Sky opens suspends objects, earth moves splits breaks.
translations.idiomatic: When the sky opens, objects are suspended; when the earth moves, it splits and breaks.

translations.literal: Mountains collapse and move, rivers block streams dam;
translations.idiomatic: Mountains collapse and move, and rivers block and streams are dammed;

sentences.zh: 水澹（澤竭）地長，［澤竭］見象。

translations.literal: Water calm marshes dry, earth grows, marshes dry appear signs.
translations.idiomatic: When water is calm and marshes dry, and the earth grows, the drying of marshes appears as a sign.

sentences.zh: 城郭門閭，閨臬［枯槁］槁枯；

translations.literal: City walls gates lanes, inner gates withered dry;
translations.idiomatic: City walls, gates, and lanes, and inner gates become withered and dry;

translations.literal: Palaces temples mansions residences, people's dwelling places.
translations.idiomatic: Palaces, temples, mansions, and residences are where the people dwell.

translations.literal: Songs customs chariots clothing, observe people's food and drink.
translations.idiomatic: Songs, customs, chariots, and clothing, and observe the people's food and drink.

translations.literal: Five grains grasses trees, observe that which they belong to.
translations.idiomatic: Five grains, grasses, and trees, and observe what they belong to.

translations.literal: Granaries treasuries stables storehouses, four connecting roads.
translations.idiomatic: Granaries, treasuries, stables, and storehouses, and the roads that connect in four directions.

translations.literal: Six domestic animals wild beasts, that which are produced depart and approach;
translations.idiomatic: Six domestic animals and wild beasts, and what they produce, depart and approach;

translations.literal: Fish turtles birds rats, observe where they dwell.
translations.idiomatic: Fish, turtles, birds, and rats, and observe where they dwell.

translations.literal: Ghosts cry like calling, those people encounter confusion.
translations.idiomatic: When ghosts cry like calling, those people will encounter confusion.

translations.literal: Transformed words, truly so.
translations.idiomatic: Transformed words are truly so.

translations.literal: In general observing year's good and bad, carefully observe year's beginning.
translations.idiomatic: In general, when observing whether the year will be good or bad, carefully observe the beginning of the year.

sentences.zh: 歲始或冬至日，產氣始萌。

translations.literal: Year's beginning or winter solstice day, productive qi begins to sprout.
translations.idiomatic: On the beginning of the year or the winter solstice day, productive qi begins to sprout.

sentences.zh: 臘明日，人眾卒歲，一會飲食，發陽氣，故曰初歲。

translations.literal: Day after La Festival, people complete year, once gather food and drink, emit yang qi, therefore called beginning year.
translations.idiomatic: On the day after the La Festival, the people complete the year, gather once for food and drink, and emit yang qi. Therefore, it is called the beginning year.

translations.literal: First month dawn, king's year beginning;
translations.idiomatic: The dawn of the first month is the king's beginning of the year;

translations.literal: Spring begins day, four seasons' beginning also.
translations.idiomatic: The day when spring begins is the beginning of the four seasons.

translations.literal: Four beginnings, are the days for observation.
translations.idiomatic: These four beginnings are the days for observation.

sentences.zh: 而漢魏鮮集臘明正月旦決八風。

translations.literal: And Han Wei Xian gathered day after La and first month dawn to determine eight winds.
translations.idiomatic: And Wei Xian of the Han gathered observations from the day after the La Festival and the dawn of the first month to determine the eight winds.

translations.literal: Wind from south comes, great drought;
translations.idiomatic: When wind comes from the south, there will be great drought;

translations.literal: Southwest, small drought;
translations.idiomatic: From the southwest, there will be a small drought;

translations.literal: West, there will be warfare;
translations.idiomatic: From the west, there will be warfare;

translations.literal: Northwest, Rong beans ripen, small rain, hasten warfare;
translations.idiomatic: From the northwest, Rong beans will ripen, there will be small rain, and warfare will be hastened;

translations.literal: North, is middle year;
translations.idiomatic: From the north, it will be a middle year;

translations.literal: Northeast, is superior year;
translations.idiomatic: From the northeast, it will be a superior year;

translations.literal: East, great water;
translations.idiomatic: From the east, there will be great water;

translations.literal: Southeast, people have disease and epidemic, year bad.
translations.idiomatic: From the southeast, the people will have disease and epidemic, and the year will be bad.

sentences.zh: 故八風各與其沖對，課多者為勝。

translations.literal: Therefore eight winds each with their opposite confront, those with more observations win.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, the eight winds each confront their opposites, and those with more observations win.

translations.literal: Many defeat few, long-lasting defeat urgent, fast defeat slow.
translations.idiomatic: Many defeat few, long-lasting defeat urgent, and fast defeat slow.

translations.literal: Dawn to meal time, is wheat;
translations.idiomatic: From dawn to meal time, it is wheat;

translations.literal: Meal time to sun declining, is millet;
translations.idiomatic: From meal time to when the sun declines, it is millet;

translations.literal: Sun declining to evening meal, is glutinous millet;
translations.idiomatic: From when the sun declines to the evening meal, it is glutinous millet;

translations.literal: Evening meal to late evening meal, is beans;
translations.idiomatic: From the evening meal to the late evening meal, it is beans;

translations.literal: Late evening meal to sun setting, is hemp.
translations.idiomatic: From the late evening meal to when the sun sets, it is hemp.

sentences.zh: 欲終日（有雨）有雲，有風，有日。

translations.literal: Desire all day have clouds, have wind, have sun.
translations.idiomatic: One desires that throughout the day there be clouds, wind, and sun.

translations.literal: Sun at its time, deep and many fruits;
translations.idiomatic: When the sun is at its time, the crops will be deep-rooted and bear many fruits;

sentences.zh: 無雲有風日，當其時，淺而多實；

translations.literal: No clouds have wind and sun, at its time, shallow and many fruits;
translations.idiomatic: When there are no clouds but there are wind and sun at its time, the crops will be shallow-rooted but bear many fruits;

sentences.zh: 有雲風，無日，當其時，深而少實；

translations.literal: Have clouds and wind, no sun, at its time, deep and few fruits;
translations.idiomatic: When there are clouds and wind but no sun at its time, the crops will be deep-rooted but bear few fruits;

sentences.zh: 有日，無雲，不風，當其時者稼有敗。

translations.literal: Have sun, no clouds, no wind, at its time crops have failure.
translations.idiomatic: When there is sun but no clouds and no wind at its time, the crops will have failure.

translations.literal: Like meal time, small failure;
translations.idiomatic: If it lasts for a meal time, there will be a small failure;

translations.literal: Time to cook five dou of rice, great failure.
translations.idiomatic: If it lasts for the time to cook five dou of rice, there will be a great failure.

sentences.zh: 則風復起，有雲，其稼復起。

translations.literal: Then wind again arises, have clouds, the crops again arise.
translations.idiomatic: Then if wind arises again and there are clouds, the crops will again arise.

sentences.zh: 各以其時用雲色占種（其）所宜。

translations.literal: Each according to its time use cloud color to divine planting what is suitable.
translations.idiomatic: Each according to its time, use the color of clouds to divine what is suitable for planting.

translations.literal: If it rains or snows or is cold, year bad.
translations.idiomatic: If it rains, snows, or is cold, the year will be bad.

sentences.zh: 是日光明，聽都邑人民之聲。

translations.literal: This day bright, listen to cities and towns people's sounds.
translations.idiomatic: On this bright day, listen to the sounds of the people in the cities and towns.

translations.literal: Sound gong note, then year good, auspicious;
translations.idiomatic: If the sound is the gong note, then the year will be good and auspicious;

translations.literal: Shang note, then there will be warfare;
translations.idiomatic: If it is the shang note, then there will be warfare;

translations.literal: Zhi note, drought;
translations.idiomatic: If it is the zhi note, there will be drought;

translations.literal: Yu note, water;
translations.idiomatic: If it is the yu note, there will be water;

translations.literal: Jue note, year bad.
translations.idiomatic: If it is the jue note, the year will be bad.

translations.literal: Or from first month dawn compare count rain.
translations.idiomatic: Or from the dawn of the first month, compare and count the rain.

sentences.zh: 率日食一升，至七升而極；

translations.literal: Generally daily one sheng, reaching seven sheng is extreme;
translations.idiomatic: Generally, one sheng per day, reaching seven sheng is the extreme;

translations.literal: Exceeding it, do not divine.
translations.idiomatic: If it exceeds this, do not divine.

sentences.zh: 數至十二日，日直其月，占水旱。

translations.literal: Count reaching twelve days, day corresponds to its month, divine water and drought.
translations.idiomatic: Count to the twelfth day, and when the day corresponds to its month, divine water and drought.

sentences.zh: 為其環（城）［域］千里內占，則（其）為天下候，竟正月。

translations.literal: For its surrounding region thousand li within divine, then it is all under heaven observation, throughout first month.
translations.idiomatic: For divination within a thousand li of its surrounding region, then it is observation for all under heaven, throughout the first month.

sentences.zh: 月所離列宿，日、風、雲，占其國。

translations.literal: Moon's separated constellations, sun, wind, clouds, divine that state.
translations.idiomatic: For the constellations that the moon separates from, and the sun, wind, and clouds, divine that state.

translations.literal: However must observe Great Year's location.
translations.idiomatic: However, one must observe where the Great Year is located.

translations.literal: In metal, abundant harvest;
translations.idiomatic: When it is in metal, there will be an abundant harvest;

translations.literal: Water, destruction;
translations.idiomatic: When it is in water, there will be destruction;

translations.literal: Wood, famine;
translations.idiomatic: When it is in wood, there will be famine;

translations.literal: Fire, drought.
translations.idiomatic: When it is in fire, there will be drought.

translations.literal: This is the great principle.
translations.idiomatic: This is the great principle.

sentences.zh: 正月上甲，風從東方，宜蠶；

translations.literal: First month first jia day, wind from east, suitable for silkworms;
translations.idiomatic: On the first jia day of the first month, when wind comes from the east, it is suitable for silkworms;

translations.literal: Wind from west, if dawn yellow clouds, bad.
translations.idiomatic: When wind comes from the west, or if there are yellow clouds at dawn, it is bad.

sentences.zh: 冬至短極，縣土炭，炭動，鹿解角，蘭根出，泉水躍，略以知日至，要決晷景。

translations.literal: Winter solstice day short extreme, suspend earth and charcoal, charcoal moves, deer shed horns, orchid roots emerge, spring water leaps, roughly to know solstice arrives, essential to determine sundial shadow.
translations.idiomatic: On the winter solstice, when the day is shortest, suspend earth and charcoal; when the charcoal moves, deer shed their horns, orchid roots emerge, and spring water leaps. Roughly, one can know when the solstice arrives, but it is essential to determine it by the sundial shadow.

translations.literal: Where Year Star is located, five grains meet prosperity.
translations.idiomatic: Where the Year Star is located, the five grains will meet prosperity.

translations.literal: Its opposite is confrontation, year then has calamity.
translations.idiomatic: Its opposite is confrontation, and then the year will have calamity.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：自初生民以來，世主曷嘗不歷日月星辰？

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: From beginning when people were born until now, have the rulers of the world not all observed sun moon stars?
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian said: From the beginning when people were born until now, have the rulers of the world not all observed the sun, moon, and stars?

sentences.zh: 及至五家、三代，紹而明之，內冠帶，外夷狄，分中國為十有二州，仰則觀象於天，俯則法類於地。

translations.literal: Reaching to Five Emperors and Three Dynasties, continued and clarified it, within cap and sash, outside barbarians, divided central states into ten and two provinces, looking up then observed signs in sky, looking down then modeled categories on earth.
translations.idiomatic: Reaching to the Five Emperors and Three Dynasties, they continued and clarified it. Within, there were those with caps and sashes; without, there were the barbarians. They divided the central states into twelve provinces. Looking up, they observed signs in the sky; looking down, they modeled categories on the earth.

sentences.zh: 天則有日月，地則有陰陽。

translations.literal: Heaven then has sun and moon, earth then has yin and yang.
translations.idiomatic: Heaven has the sun and moon; earth has yin and yang.

translations.literal: Heaven has five stars, earth has five phases.
translations.idiomatic: Heaven has the five stars; earth has the five phases.

sentences.zh: 天則有列宿，地則有州域。

translations.literal: Heaven then has arrayed constellations, earth then has provinces and regions.
translations.idiomatic: Heaven has the arrayed constellations; earth has provinces and regions.

sentences.zh: 三光者，陰陽之精，氣本在地，而聖人統理之。

translations.literal: Three lights, are yin and yang's essence, qi origin is on earth, and sages unified and managed them.
translations.idiomatic: The three lights are the essence of yin and yang. The origin of qi is on earth, and the sages unified and managed them.

translations.literal: From You and Li onward, it is ancient.
translations.idiomatic: From the time of You and Li onward, it is ancient.

sentences.zh: 所見天變，皆國殊窟穴，家占物怪，以合時應，其文圖籍禨祥不法。

translations.literal: The celestial changes seen, all states different caves and holes, families divined things and anomalies, to match time and response, their texts charts records omens and auspices not following law.
translations.idiomatic: The celestial changes seen were all interpreted differently by each state, with families divining things and anomalies to match the times and responses. Their texts, charts, and records of omens and auspices did not follow the law.

sentences.zh: 是以孔子論六經，紀異而說不書。

translations.literal: Therefore Confucius discussed Six Classics, recorded anomalies yet explanations not written.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, when Confucius discussed the Six Classics, he recorded anomalies but did not write down the explanations.

translations.literal: As for the Way of Heaven and fate, do not transmit;
translations.idiomatic: As for the Way of Heaven and fate, do not transmit it;

translations.literal: Transmit to the right person, do not wait to be told;
translations.idiomatic: Transmit it to the right person, and do not wait to be told;

translations.literal: Tell it to one who is not the right person, although spoken not recorded.
translations.idiomatic: If told to one who is not the right person, although spoken, it will not be recorded.

sentences.zh: 昔之傳天數者：高辛之前，重、黎；

translations.literal: Those of old who transmitted celestial numbers: before Gaoxin, Zhong and Li;
translations.idiomatic: Those of old who transmitted the celestial numbers: before Gaoxin, there were Zhong and Li;

translations.literal: In Tang and Yu, Xi and He;
translations.idiomatic: In the times of Tang and Yu, there were Xi and He;

translations.literal: In Xia, Kunwu;
translations.idiomatic: In Xia, there was Kunwu;

translations.literal: Yin Shang, Wu Xian;
translations.idiomatic: In Yin Shang, there was Wu Xian;

translations.literal: Zhou court, Shi Yi and Chang Hong;
translations.idiomatic: In the Zhou court, there were Shi Yi and Chang Hong;

translations.literal: In Song, Ziwei;
translations.idiomatic: In Song, there was Ziwei;

translations.literal: In Zheng then Pi Zao;
translations.idiomatic: In Zheng, there was Pi Zao;

translations.literal: In Qi, Gan Gong;
translations.idiomatic: In Qi, there was Gan Gong;

translations.literal: In Chu, Tang Mei;
translations.idiomatic: In Chu, there was Tang Mei;

translations.literal: In Zhao, Yin Gao;
translations.idiomatic: In Zhao, there was Yin Gao;

translations.literal: In Wei, Shi Shen.
translations.idiomatic: In Wei, there was Shi Shen.

sentences.zh: 夫天運，三十歲一小變，百年中變，五百載大變；

translations.literal: The movement of heaven, thirty years small change, hundred years middle change, five hundred years great change;
translations.idiomatic: The movement of heaven: every thirty years there is a small change, every hundred years a middle change, and every five hundred years a great change;

sentences.zh: 三大變一紀，三紀而大備：此其大數也。

translations.literal: Three great changes one cycle, three cycles then great completion: this is the great number.
translations.idiomatic: Three great changes make one cycle, and three cycles complete the great preparation. This is the great number.

translations.literal: Those who govern states must value three and five.
translations.idiomatic: Those who govern states must value the three and the five.

sentences.zh: 上下各千歲，然後天人之際續備。

translations.literal: Above and below each thousand years, then the relationship between heaven and man continues and is complete.
translations.idiomatic: Above and below, each for a thousand years, and then the relationship between heaven and man continues and is complete.

sentences.zh: 太史公推古天變，未有可考于今者。

translations.literal: Grand Historian investigated ancient celestial changes, none that can be verified in present.
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian investigated ancient celestial changes, but there are none that can be verified in the present.

sentences.zh: 蓋略以春秋二百四十二年之閒，日蝕三十六，彗星三見，宋襄公時星隕如雨。

translations.literal: Roughly in Spring and Autumn Annals two hundred forty-two years' period, solar eclipses thirty-six, comets three appearances, Duke Xiang of Song's time stars fell like rain.
translations.idiomatic: Roughly, in the period of two hundred forty-two years covered by the Spring and Autumn Annals, there were thirty-six solar eclipses, comets appeared three times, and in the time of Duke Xiang of Song, stars fell like rain.

sentences.zh: 天子微，諸侯力政，五伯代興，更為主命，自是之後，眾暴寡，大并小。

translations.literal: Son of Heaven weak, feudal lords forceful governance, Five Hegemons in turn arose, changed to be master of commands, from this afterward, many oppressed few, large annexed small.
translations.idiomatic: The Son of Heaven was weak, the feudal lords governed by force, the Five Hegemons arose in turn and changed to be masters of commands. From this time afterward, the many oppressed the few, and the large annexed the small.

sentences.zh: 秦、楚、吳、越，夷狄也，為彊伯。

translations.literal: Qin, Chu, Wu, Yue, were barbarians, became strong hegemons.
translations.idiomatic: Qin, Chu, Wu, and Yue, which were barbarians, became the strong hegemons.

sentences.zh: 田氏篡齊，三家分晉，并為戰國。

translations.literal: Tian clan usurped Qi, three families divided Jin, all became Warring States.
translations.idiomatic: The Tian clan usurped Qi, the three families divided Jin, and all became the Warring States.

sentences.zh: 爭於攻取，兵革更起，城邑數屠，因以饑饉疾疫焦苦，臣主共憂患，其察禨祥候星氣尤急。

translations.literal: Contended in attacking and seizing, warfare repeatedly arose, cities and towns repeatedly slaughtered, therefore with famine disease and epidemic scorched and bitter, ministers and rulers together worried and suffered, their observation of omens and auspices and waiting for star qi was especially urgent.
translations.idiomatic: They contended in attacking and seizing, warfare repeatedly arose, cities and towns were repeatedly slaughtered, and therefore there was famine, disease, and epidemic, scorched and bitter. The ministers and rulers together worried and suffered, and their observation of omens and auspices and waiting for star qi was especially urgent.

sentences.zh: 近世十二諸侯七國相王，言從衡者繼踵，而皋、唐、甘、石因時務論其書傳，故其占驗淩雜米鹽。

translations.literal: Recent times twelve feudal lords seven states mutually called kings, those who spoke of vertical and horizontal alliances followed one after another, and Gao, Tang, Gan, Shi according to current affairs discussed their books and transmissions, therefore their divinations and verifications were mixed and miscellaneous like rice and salt.
translations.idiomatic: In recent times, the twelve feudal lords and seven states mutually called themselves kings, and those who spoke of vertical and horizontal alliances followed one after another. Gao, Tang, Gan, and Shi discussed their books and transmissions according to current affairs. Therefore, their divinations and verifications were mixed and miscellaneous like rice and salt.

sentences.zh: 二十八舍主十二州，斗秉兼之，所從來久矣。

translations.literal: Twenty-eight lodgings govern twelve provinces, Dipper handle combines them, that from which it comes is long.
translations.idiomatic: The twenty-eight lodgings govern the twelve provinces, and the Dipper handle combines them. This has been so for a long time.

sentences.zh: 秦之疆也，候在太白，占於狼、弧。

translations.literal: Qin's territory, observation is in Venus, divination is at Wolf and Bow.
translations.idiomatic: For Qin's territory, observation is in Venus, and divination is at the Wolf and Bow.

sentences.zh: 吳、楚之疆，候在熒惑，占於鳥衡。

translations.literal: Wu and Chu's territory, observation is in Mars, divination is at Bird Balance.
translations.idiomatic: For Wu and Chu's territory, observation is in Mars, and divination is at the Bird Balance.

sentences.zh: 燕、齊之疆，候在辰星，占於虛、危。

translations.literal: Yan and Qi's territory, observation is in Mercury, divination is at Xu and Wei.
translations.idiomatic: For the territory of Yan and Qi, observation is in Mercury, and divination is at Xu and Wei.

sentences.zh: 宋、鄭之疆，候在歲星，占於房、心。

translations.literal: Song and Zheng's territory, observation is in Year Star, divination is at Fang and Xin.
translations.idiomatic: For Song and Zheng's territory, observation is in the Year Star, and divination is at Fang and Xin.

sentences.zh: 晉之疆，亦候在辰星，占於參罰。

translations.literal: Jin's territory, also observation is in Mercury, divination is at Shen and Fa.
