translations.idiomatic: For Jin's territory, observation is also in Mercury, and divination is at Shen and Fa.

sentences.zh: 及秦并吞三晉、燕、代，自河山以南者中國。

translations.literal: When Qin annexed Three Jin, Yan, and Dai, from Yellow River and mountains southward is central states.
translations.idiomatic: When Qin annexed the Three Jin, Yan, and Dai, that which is south of the Yellow River and mountains is the central states.

sentences.zh: 中國於四海內則在東南，為陽；

translations.literal: Central states within four seas then are in southeast, are yang;
translations.idiomatic: The central states within the four seas are in the southeast and are yang;

translations.literal: Yang then sun, Year Star, Mars, Saturn;
translations.idiomatic: Yang corresponds to the sun, the Year Star, Mars, and Saturn;

translations.literal: Divination is at street south, Bi governs it.
translations.idiomatic: Divination is at the street south, and Bi governs it.

sentences.zh: 其西北則胡、貉、月氏諸衣旃裘引弓之民，為陰；

translations.literal: Its northwest then Hu, Mo, Yuezhi and others who wear felt and fur draw bow people, are yin;
translations.idiomatic: To its northwest are the Hu, Mo, Yuezhi, and others who wear felt and fur and draw bows—these are yin;

translations.literal: Yin then moon, Venus, Mercury;
translations.idiomatic: Yin corresponds to the moon, Venus, and Mercury;

translations.literal: Divination is at street north, Mao governs it.
translations.idiomatic: Divination is at the street north, and Mao governs it.

sentences.zh: 故中國山川東北流，其維，首在隴、蜀，尾沒于勃、碣。

translations.literal: Therefore central states' mountains and rivers flow northeast, their cords, head is at Long and Shu, tail submerges at Bohai and Jieshi.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, the central states' mountains and rivers flow northeast. Their cords begin at Long and Shu and end submerged at Bohai and Jieshi.

sentences.zh: 是以秦、晉好用兵，復占太白，太白主中國；

translations.literal: Therefore Qin and Jin liked to use warfare, again divined Venus, Venus governs central states;
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, Qin and Jin liked to use warfare, and again divined Venus, for Venus governs the central states;

sentences.zh: 而胡、貉數侵掠，獨占辰星，辰星出入躁疾，常主夷狄：其大經也。

translations.literal: And Hu and Mo frequently invaded and plundered, alone divined Mercury, Mercury emerges and enters restlessly and quickly, constantly governs barbarians: this is the great principle.
translations.idiomatic: And the Hu and Mo frequently invaded and plundered, and alone divined Mercury. Mercury emerges and enters restlessly and quickly, and constantly governs the barbarians. This is the great principle.

translations.literal: This changes to be guest and host.
translations.idiomatic: This changes to be guest and host.

sentences.zh: 熒惑為孛，外則理兵，內則理政。

translations.literal: Mars is comet, outside then manage warfare, inside then manage government.
translations.idiomatic: Mars is the comet. Outside, it manages warfare; inside, it manages government.

sentences.zh: 故曰「雖有明天子，必視熒惑所在」。

translations.literal: Therefore it is said 'Although there is enlightened Son of Heaven, must observe where Mars is located.'
translations.idiomatic: Therefore it is said, 'Although there is an enlightened Son of Heaven, one must observe where Mars is located.'

sentences.zh: 諸侯更彊，時菑異記，無可錄者。

translations.literal: Feudal lords changed and strengthened, times disasters and anomalies recorded, none that can be recorded.
translations.idiomatic: The feudal lords changed and strengthened, and the disasters and anomalies of the times were recorded, but there is none that can be recorded.

sentences.zh: 秦始皇之時，十五年彗星四見，久者八十日，長或竟天。

translations.literal: First Emperor of Qin's time, fifteen years comets four appearances, longest eighty days, length sometimes reached sky.
translations.idiomatic: In the time of the First Emperor of Qin, in fifteen years comets appeared four times, the longest lasting eighty days, and their length sometimes reached across the sky.

sentences.zh: 其後秦遂以兵滅六王，并中國，外攘四夷，死人如亂麻，因以張楚并起，三十年之閒兵相駘藉，不可勝數。

translations.literal: Afterward Qin then used warfare to destroy six kings, annexed central states, outside repelled four barbarians, dead people like tangled hemp, therefore with Zhang Chu together arose, thirty years' period warfare mutually trampled, cannot be counted.
translations.idiomatic: Afterward, Qin then used warfare to destroy the six kings, annexed the central states, and outside repelled the four barbarians. The dead were like tangled hemp, and therefore Zhang Chu arose together. In the period of thirty years, warfare mutually trampled, and the dead could not be counted.

sentences.zh: 自蚩尤以來，未嘗若斯也。

translations.literal: From Chiyou until now, never has it been like this.
translations.idiomatic: From Chiyou until now, it has never been like this.

sentences.zh: 項羽救鉅鹿，枉矢西流，山東遂合從諸侯，西坑秦人，誅屠咸陽。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu rescued Julu, Wanshi flowed west, east of mountains then united vertical alliance feudal lords, west buried Qin people, executed and slaughtered Xianyang.
translations.idiomatic: When Xiang Yu rescued Julu, Wanshi flowed west, and the feudal lords east of the mountains then united in a vertical alliance, buried the Qin people in the west, and executed and slaughtered in Xianyang.

translations.literal: Han's rise, five stars gathered at Eastern Well.
translations.idiomatic: At the rise of the Han, the five stars gathered at the Eastern Well.

sentences.zh: 平城之圍，月暈參、畢七重。

translations.literal: Pingcheng's siege, moon halo Shen and Bi seven layers.
translations.idiomatic: At the siege of Pingcheng, the moon had a halo around Shen and Bi in seven layers.

translations.literal: Various Lü made disorder, solar eclipse, daytime dark.
translations.idiomatic: When the various Lü made disorder, there was a solar eclipse, and the daytime was dark.

sentences.zh: 吳楚七國叛逆，彗星數丈，天狗過梁野；

translations.literal: Wu Chu seven states rebelled, comet several zhang, Heavenly Dog passed Liang wilds;
translations.idiomatic: When Wu and Chu and the seven states rebelled, there was a comet several zhang long, and the Heavenly Dog passed over the wilds of Liang;

sentences.zh: 及兵起，遂伏尸流血其下。

translations.literal: When warfare arose, then prostrate corpses and flowing blood below it.
translations.idiomatic: When warfare arose, there were prostrate corpses and flowing blood below it.

sentences.zh: 元光、元狩，蚩尤之旗再見，長則半天。

translations.literal: Yuanguang and Yuanshou eras, Chiyou's Banner again appeared, length then half sky.
translations.idiomatic: In the Yuanguang and Yuanshou eras, Chiyou's Banner appeared again, and its length reached half the sky.

sentences.zh: 其後京師師四出，誅夷狄者數十年，而伐胡尤甚。

translations.literal: Afterward capital's armies four directions emerged, executed barbarians for several decades, and attacking Hu was especially severe.
translations.idiomatic: Afterward, the capital's armies emerged in four directions and executed barbarians for several decades, and the attacks on the Hu were especially severe.

translations.literal: Yue's fall, Mars guarded Dipper;
translations.idiomatic: At the fall of Yue, Mars guarded the Dipper;

translations.literal: Chaoxian's capture, star comet at River Garrison;
translations.idiomatic: At the capture of Chaoxian, there was a comet star at the River Garrison;

sentences.zh: 兵征大宛，星茀招搖：此其犖犖大者。

translations.literal: Warfare campaigned against Dayuan, comet star at Zhaoyao: these are the prominent great ones.
translations.idiomatic: When warfare campaigned against Dayuan, there was a comet star at Zhaoyao. These are the prominent great ones.

sentences.zh: 若至委曲小變，不可勝道。

translations.literal: As for the detailed small changes, cannot be fully told.
translations.idiomatic: As for the detailed small changes, they cannot be fully told.

sentences.zh: 由是觀之，未有不先形見而應隨之者也。

translations.literal: From this observing it, there is none that does not first appear in form and then response follows it.
translations.idiomatic: From this, one can observe that there is none that does not first appear in form and then have a response follow it.

sentences.zh: 夫自漢之為天數者，星則唐都，氣則王朔，占歲則魏鮮。

translations.literal: Those from Han who practice celestial numbers, stars then Tang Du, qi then Wang Shuo, divining year then Wei Xian.
translations.idiomatic: Those from the Han who practice the celestial numbers: for stars, there is Tang Du; for qi, there is Wang Shuo; for divining the year, there is Wei Xian.

sentences.zh: 故甘、石歷五星法，唯獨熒惑有反逆行；

translations.literal: Therefore Gan and Shi's calendar of five stars method, only Mars has reverse retrograde movement;
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, in Gan and Shi's method of calendaring the five stars, only Mars has reverse retrograde movement;

sentences.zh: 逆行所守，及他星逆行，日月薄蝕，皆以為占。

translations.literal: Retrograde movement's dwelling, and other stars' retrograde movement, sun and moon approaching and eclipsing, all use to divine.
translations.idiomatic: The dwelling of retrograde movement, and the retrograde movement of other stars, and the sun and moon approaching and eclipsing, are all used for divination.

sentences.zh: 余觀史記，考行事，百年之中，五星無出而不反逆行，反逆行，嘗盛大而變色；

translations.literal: I observed historical records, examined actions and events, hundred years' period, five stars none emerged without reverse retrograde movement, reverse retrograde movement, once great and changed color;
translations.idiomatic: I observed the historical records and examined actions and events. In a period of a hundred years, none of the five stars emerged without reverse retrograde movement, and when they had reverse retrograde movement, they once became great and changed color;

sentences.zh: 日月薄蝕，行南北有時：此其大度也。

translations.literal: Sun and moon approaching and eclipsing, moving north and south have times: this is the great measure.
translations.idiomatic: The sun and moon approaching and eclipsing, and moving north and south, have their times. This is the great measure.

sentences.zh: 故紫宮、房心、權衡、咸池、虛危列宿部星，此天之五官坐位也，為經，不移徙，大小有差，闊狹有常。

translations.literal: Therefore Purple Palace, Fang and Xin, Quan and Heng, Xianchi, Xu and Wei arrayed constellations' section stars, these are heaven's five offices' seats, are warp, do not move and shift, large and small have differences, wide and narrow have constancy.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, the Purple Palace, Fang and Xin, Quan and Heng, Xianchi, and Xu and Wei—the section stars of the arrayed constellations—these are the seats of heaven's five offices. They are the warp, do not move and shift, have differences in size, and have constancy in width and narrowness.

sentences.zh: 水、火、金、木、填星，此五星者，天之五佐，為［經］緯，見伏有時，所過行贏縮有度。

translations.literal: Water, fire, metal, wood, Saturn, these five stars, are heaven's five assistants, are weft, appear and hide have times, that which they pass and move have excess and contraction have measure.
translations.idiomatic: Water, fire, metal, wood, and Saturn—these five stars are heaven's five assistants. They are the weft, appear and hide at their times, and that which they pass and move has excess and contraction with measure.

sentences.zh: 日變修德，月變省刑，星變結和。

translations.literal: Sun changes cultivate virtue, moon changes reduce punishments, star changes establish harmony.
translations.idiomatic: When the sun changes, cultivate virtue; when the moon changes, reduce punishments; when stars change, establish harmony.

translations.literal: In general celestial changes, exceeding measure then divine.
translations.idiomatic: In general, for celestial changes, only when they exceed the measure should one divine.

translations.literal: State ruler strong and great, those with virtue prosper;
translations.idiomatic: When the state ruler is strong and great, those with virtue will prosper;

translations.literal: Weak and small, those who adorn and deceive perish.
translations.idiomatic: When weak and small, those who adorn and deceive will perish.

sentences.zh: 太上修德，其次修政，其次修救，其次修禳，正下無之。

translations.literal: Supreme cultivate virtue, next cultivate government, next cultivate rescue, next cultivate exorcism, correct below none of it.
translations.idiomatic: The supreme cultivates virtue; next, one cultivates government; next, one cultivates rescue; next, one cultivates exorcism. The correct below has none of it.

sentences.zh: 夫常星之變希見，而三光之占亟用。

translations.literal: Constant stars' changes are rarely seen, and three lights' divination is urgently used.
translations.idiomatic: The changes of constant stars are rarely seen, and the divination of the three lights is urgently used.

sentences.zh: 日月暈適，雲風，此天之客氣，其發見亦有大運。

translations.literal: Sun and moon halos and eclipses, clouds and wind, these are heaven's guest qi, their appearance also has great movement.
translations.idiomatic: The halos and eclipses of the sun and moon, and clouds and wind—these are heaven's guest qi, and their appearance also has great movement.

sentences.zh: 然其與政事俯仰，最近（大）［天］人之符。

translations.literal: However their correspondence with government affairs rising and falling, most closely matches heaven and man's tallies.
translations.idiomatic: However, their correspondence with government affairs rising and falling most closely matches the tallies of heaven and man.

translations.literal: These five, are heaven's moving and responding.
translations.idiomatic: These five are heaven's moving and responding.

translations.literal: Those who practice celestial numbers, must understand three and five.
translations.idiomatic: Those who practice the celestial numbers must understand the three and the five.

sentences.zh: 終始古今，深觀時變，察其精粗，則天官備矣。

translations.literal: Beginning and end ancient and present, deeply observe time's changes, examine their refined and coarse, then celestial offices are complete.
translations.idiomatic: From beginning to end, ancient and present, deeply observe the changes of time, and examine their refined and coarse. Then the celestial offices are complete.

translations.literal: Green Emperor practices virtue, Heaven Gate opens for it.
translations.idiomatic: When the Green Emperor practices virtue, the Heaven Gate opens for it.

translations.literal: Red Emperor practices virtue, Heaven Prison empties for it.
translations.idiomatic: When the Red Emperor practices virtue, the Heaven Prison empties for it.

translations.literal: Yellow Emperor practices virtue, Heaven's premature death rises for it.
translations.idiomatic: When the Yellow Emperor practices virtue, Heaven's premature death rises for it.

translations.literal: Wind comes from northwest, must be on Geng and Xin days.
translations.idiomatic: When wind comes from the northwest, it must be on Geng and Xin days.

translations.literal: One autumn period, five arrivals, great amnesty;
translations.idiomatic: If in one autumn period there are five arrivals, there will be a great amnesty;

translations.literal: Three arrivals, small amnesty.
translations.idiomatic: If there are three arrivals, there will be a small amnesty.

sentences.zh: 白帝行德，以正月二十日、二十一日，月暈圍，常大赦載，謂有太陽也。

translations.literal: White Emperor practices virtue, on first month twentieth day and twenty-first day, moon halo surrounds, constantly great amnesty records, it is said there is Great Yang.
translations.idiomatic: When the White Emperor practices virtue, on the twentieth and twenty-first days of the first month, when the moon halo surrounds, there are constant records of great amnesty. It is said there is the Great Yang.

sentences.zh: 一曰：白帝行德，畢、昴為之圍。

translations.literal: One says: White Emperor practices virtue, Bi and Mao are surrounded for it.
translations.idiomatic: One says: When the White Emperor practices virtue, Bi and Mao are surrounded for it.

translations.literal: Surround three evenings, virtue then completes;
translations.idiomatic: If it surrounds for three evenings, virtue then completes;

sentences.zh: 不三暮，及圍不合，德不成。

translations.literal: Not three evenings, and surround does not match, virtue does not complete.
translations.idiomatic: If it is not three evenings, and the surround does not match, virtue does not complete.

translations.literal: Second says: with Mercury surround, does not emerge its ten-day period.
translations.idiomatic: The second says: When Mercury surrounds, it does not emerge within its ten-day period.

translations.literal: Black Emperor practices virtue, Heaven Gate moves for it.
translations.idiomatic: When the Black Emperor practices virtue, the Heaven Gate moves for it.

translations.literal: Heaven practices virtue, Son of Heaven changes and establishes year;
translations.idiomatic: When heaven practices virtue, the Son of Heaven changes and establishes the year;

translations.literal: Not virtue, wind and rain break stones.
translations.idiomatic: If there is no virtue, wind and rain will break stones.

translations.literal: Three Neng and three Heng, are Heaven's court.
translations.idiomatic: The Three Neng and Three Heng are Heaven's court.

translations.literal: Guest star emerges from Heaven's court, there are strange commands.
translations.idiomatic: When a guest star emerges from Heaven's court, there are strange commands.
